channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 年度预测低于预期 惠而浦股价下跌
item.description: Whirlpool forecast full-year sales and profit below analysts' estimates on Monday, as the home appliance maker navigates pricing pressure from rivals and higher expenses, sending its shares down about 4% in extended trading.翻译:惠而浦周一预计全年销售额和利润将低于分析师的预期，因这家家电制造商面临来自竞争对手的定价压力和更高的费用，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌约 4%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲 忘掉中国过度建设的后果吧——这是就业、就业和美联储
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 一名女子因涉嫌从中国欺诈中洗钱 63 亿美元而在伦敦受审
item.description: A woman converted bitcoin into cash and property to help launder the proceeds of a 5 billion pound ($6.3 billion) fraud which was perpetrated in China, prosecutors told a London court on Monday.翻译:检察官周一告诉伦敦一家法院，一名女子将比特币兑换成现金和财产，以帮助洗钱在中国实施的 50 亿英镑（63 亿美元）欺诈案的收益。
item.author: Sam Tobin

item.title: 议员们希望美国调查四家参与福特电池厂的中国公司——信函
item.description: The chairs of two U.S. House committees asked the Biden administration to investigate four Chinese companies they say are involved in Ford Motor's planned Michigan battery plant, according to a letter seen Monday by Reuters.翻译:据路透社周一看到的一封信函，美国众议院两个委员会的主席要求拜登政府调查四家中国公司，他们称这些公司参与了福特汽车计划中的密歇根电池工厂。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 对冲资金流 对冲基金以五年来最快速度买入中国股票 - 高盛
item.description: Hedge funds snapped up battered Chinese stocks over three days last week at the fastest pace in more than five years, Goldman Sachs wrote in a note to clients.翻译:高盛在给客户的一份报告中写道，对冲基金上周三天内以五年多来最快的速度抢购遭受重创的中国股票。
item.author: Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 中国一月份工厂活动可能收缩，但幅度较小
item.description: China's manufacturing activity in January likely shrank for the fourth straight month though at a slower pace than in December, a Reuters poll showed, indicating the country's sprawling sector was still struggling to regain momentum at the start of 2024.翻译:路透调查显示，中国 1 月份制造业活动可能连续第四个月萎缩，尽管增速较 12 月有所放缓，这表明该国庞大的制造业在 2024 年初仍难以恢复增长势头。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾否认与中国有“特殊安排”向礁石上的部队提供补给
item.description: The Philippines on Monday denied China had a "temporary special arrangement" with Manila to allow the delivery of supplies to Philippine troops occupying a disputed South China Sea reef, calling it "a figment of imagination".翻译:菲律宾周一否认中国与马尼拉达成“临时特别安排”，允许向占领南海争议岛礁的菲律宾军队运送物资，称其为“凭空想象”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国敦促耗资数十亿美元的泰国铁路项目更快取得进展
item.description: China and Thailand must accelerate the construction of a planned high-speed railway linking the countries, Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi said on Monday, pushing an ambitious Southeast Asian network.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周一表示，中国和泰国必须加快建设计划中的连接两国的高速铁路，推动雄心勃勃的东南亚网络。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国外交部将认真研究恢复对日免签政策
item.description: China's foreign ministry said on Monday that it would "seriously" study resuming a previous visa-free arrangement for Japanese visitors to China.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，将“认真”研究恢复此前对日本游客赴华免签的安排。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 内地与香港签署相互承认民商事案件安排
item.description: China's Supreme Court and Hong Kong's Department of Justice said on Monday that they signed an arrangement on the reciprocal recognition and enforcement of judgements in civil and commercial cases effective immediately in both places.翻译:中国最高法院和香港律政司周一表示，双方签署了《关于两地相互认可和执行民商事案件判决的安排》，立即生效。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 普洛斯资本为其中国收入基金 XII 筹集 14 亿美元
item.description: Asset manager GLP Capital Partners said on Monday it had partnered with a global institutional investor in raising 10 billion Chinese yuan ($1.4 billion) for its China Income Fund XII, which would own 25 logistics and business parks in China.翻译:资产管理公司普洛斯资本周一表示，已与一家全球机构投资者合作，为其中国收益基金 XII 筹集 100 亿元人民币（合 14 亿美元），该基金将在中国拥有 25 个物流和商业园区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与巴布亚新几内亚部长就警务和安全合作进行会谈
item.description: Papua New Guinea is in early talks with China on a potential security and policing deal, Foreign Minister Justin Tkachenko told Reuters, weeks after deadly riots in the South Pacific nation's capital.翻译:南太平洋国家首都发生致命骚乱几周后，巴布亚新几内亚外交部长贾斯汀·特卡琴科告诉路透社，巴布亚新几内亚正在与中国就潜在的安全和警务协议进行初步谈判。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国的增长模式使北京陷入更多贸易冲突
item.description: Brussels' trade policy is now also turning increasingly protective against the global ramifications of China's production-focused, debt-driven development model.翻译:布鲁塞尔的贸易政策现在也变得越来越保护性，以防范中国以生产为中心、债务驱动的发展模式对全球的影响。
item.author: Joe Cash, Christoph Steitz

item.title: 路透调查显示，台湾第四季度经济增长因内需和出口反弹而​​回升
item.description: Taiwan's trade-dependent economy likely grew faster in the fourth quarter than the third thanks to strong domestic consumption and a rebound in exports, a Reuters poll showed on Monday.翻译:路透周一的一项民意调查显示，由于国内消费强劲和出口反弹，台湾依赖贸易的经济第四季度的增长可能快于第三季度。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯表示海上合作是越南访问的基石
item.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Monday said talks on maritime cooperation between his country and Vietnam would be one of the cornerstones forged in a strategic partnership with its Southeast Asian neighbour.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯周一表示，菲律宾与越南之间的海上合作会谈将成为与东南亚邻国建立战略伙伴关系的基石之一。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 反应：中国恒大被香港法院下令清算
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Monday ordered the liquidation of China Evergrande Group , a move likely to send ripples through China's crumbling financial markets as policymakers scramble to contain the deepening crisis.翻译:香港一家法院周一下令对中国恒大集团进行清算，此举可能会在中国摇摇欲坠的金融市场中引发连锁反应，因为政策制定者正忙于遏制日益加深的危机。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于中国需求担忧抵消供应紧张，油价下跌
item.description: Oil prices jumped 1% on Monday on fuel supply concerns after a missile struck a Trafigura-operated fuel tanker in the Red Sea.翻译:导弹击中红海托克运营的一艘油轮后，由于燃料供应担忧，周一油价上涨 1%。
item.author: Shariq Khan
